013package org.apache.juneau.config.internal;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ThrowableUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.config.event.ConfigEventType.*;
019
020import java.io.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.concurrent.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.config.event.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.config.store.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
029
030/**
031 * Represents the parsed contents of a configuration.
032 */
033public class ConfigMap implements ConfigStoreListener {
034
035   private final ConfigStore store;         // The store that created this object.
036   private volatile String contents;        // The original contents of this object.
037   final String name;                       // The name  of this object.
038
039   // Changes that have been applied since the last load.
040   private final List<ConfigEvent> changes = synced(new ConfigEvents());
041
042   // Registered listeners listening for changes during saves or reloads.
043   private final Set<ConfigEventListener> listeners = synced(set());
044
045   // The parsed entries of this map with all changes applied.
046   final Map<String,ConfigSection> entries = synced(map());
047
048   // The original entries of this map before any changes were applied.
049   final Map<String,ConfigSection> oentries = synced(map());
050
051   // Import statements in this config.
052   final List<Import> imports = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
053
054   private final SimpleReadWriteLock lock = new SimpleReadWriteLock();
055
056   /**
057    * Constructor.
058    *
059    * @param store The config store.
060    * @param name The config name.
061    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
062    */
063   public ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name) throws IOException {
064      this.store = store;
065      this.name = name;
066      load(store.read(name));
067   }
068
069   ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name, String contents) throws IOException {
070      this.store = store;
071      this.name = name;
072      load(contents);
073   }
074
075   private ConfigMap load(String contents) throws IOException {
076      if (contents == null)
077         contents = "";
078      this.contents = contents;
079
080      entries.clear();
081      oentries.clear();
082      imports.forEach(x -> x.unregisterAll());
083      imports.clear();
084
085      Map<String,ConfigMap> imports = map();
086
087      List<String> lines = linkedList();
088      try (Scanner scanner = new Scanner(contents)) {
089         while (scanner.hasNextLine()) {
090            String line = scanner.nextLine();
091            char c = firstChar(line);
092            int c2 = StringUtils.lastNonWhitespaceChar(line);
093            if (c == '[') {
094               String l = line.trim();
095               if (c2 != ']' || ! isValidNewSectionName(l.substring(1, l.length()-1)))
096                  throw new ConfigException("Invalid section name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
097            } else if (c == '<') {
098               String l = line.trim();
099               int i = l.indexOf('>');
100               if (i != -1) {
101                  String l2 = l.substring(1, i);
102                  if (! isValidConfigName(l2))
103                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
104                  String l3 = l.substring(i+1);
105                  if (! (isEmpty(l3) || firstChar(l3) == '#'))
106                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
107                  String importName = l2.trim();
108                  try {
109                     if (! imports.containsKey(importName))
110                        imports.put(importName, store.getMap(importName));
111                  } catch (StackOverflowError e) {
112                     throw new IOException("Import loop detected in configuration '"+name+"'->'"+importName+"'");
113                  }
114               }
115            }
116            lines.add(line);
117         }
118      }
119
120      List<Import> irl = list(imports.size());
121      forEachReverse(listFrom(imports.values()), x -> irl.add(new Import(x).register(listeners)));
122      this.imports.addAll(irl);
123
124      // Add [blank] section.
125      boolean inserted = false;
126      boolean foundComment = false;
127      for (ListIterator<String> li = lines.listIterator(); li.hasNext();) {
128         String l = li.next();
129         char c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
130         if (c != '#') {
131            if (c == 0 && foundComment) {
132               li.set("[]");
133               inserted = true;
134            }
135            break;
136         }
137         foundComment = true;
138      }
139      if (! inserted)
140         lines.add(0, "[]");
141
142      // Collapse any multi-lines.
143      ListIterator<String> li = lines.listIterator(lines.size());
144      String accumulator = null;
145      while (li.hasPrevious()) {
146         String l = li.previous();
147         char c = firstChar(l);
148         if (c == '\t') {
149            c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
150            if (c != '#') {
151               if (accumulator == null)
152                  accumulator = l.substring(1);
153               else
154                  accumulator = l.substring(1) + "\n" + accumulator;
155               li.remove();
156            }
157         } else if (accumulator != null) {
158            li.set(l + "\n" + accumulator);
159            accumulator = null;
160         }
161      }
162
163      lines = copyOf(lines);
164      int last = lines.size()-1;
165      int S1 = 1; // Looking for section.
166      int S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for start.
167      int state = S1;
168
169      List<ConfigSection> sections = list();
170
171      for (int i = last; i >= 0; i--) {
172         String l = lines.get(i);
173         char c = firstChar(l);
174
175         if (state == S1) {
176            if (c == '[') {
177               state = S2;
178            }
179         } else {
180            if (c != '#' && (c == '[' || l.indexOf('=') != -1)) {
181               sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(i+1, last+1)));
182               last = i + 1;// (c == '[' ? i+1 : i);
183               state = (c == '[' ? S2 : S1);
184            }
185         }
186      }
187
188      sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(0, last+1)));
189
190      for (int i = sections.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
191         ConfigSection cs = sections.get(i);
192         if (entries.containsKey(cs.name))
193            throw new ConfigException("Duplicate section found in configuration:  [{0}]", cs.name);
194         entries.put(cs.name, cs);
195       }
196
197      oentries.putAll(entries);
198      return this;
199   }
200
201   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
202   // Getters
203   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
204
205   /**
206    * Reads an entry from this map.
207    *
208    * @param section
209    *    The section name.
210    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
211    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
212    * @param key
213    *    The entry key.
214    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
215    * @return The entry, or <jk>null</jk> if the entry doesn't exist.
216    */
217   public ConfigMapEntry getEntry(String section, String key) {
218      checkSectionName(section);
219      checkKeyName(key);
220      try (SimpleLock x = lock.read()) {
221         ConfigSection cs = entries.get(section);
222         ConfigMapEntry ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
223
224         if (ce == null)
225            ce = imports.stream().map(y -> y.getConfigMap().getEntry(section, key)).filter(y -> y != null).findFirst().orElse(null);
226
227         return ce;
228      }
229   }
230
231   /**
232    * Returns the pre-lines on the specified section.
233    *
234    * <p>
235    * The pre-lines are all lines such as blank lines and comments that preceed a section.
236    *
237    * @param section
238    *    The section name.
239    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
240    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
241    * @return
242    *    An unmodifiable list of lines, or <jk>null</jk> if the section doesn't exist.
243    */
244   public List<String> getPreLines(String section) {
245      checkSectionName(section);
246      try (SimpleLock x = lock.read()) {
247         ConfigSection cs = entries.get(section);
248         return cs == null ? null : cs.preLines;
249      }
250   }
251
252   /**
253    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
254    *
255    * @return
256    *    An unmodifiable set of keys.
257    */
258   public Set<String> getSections() {
259      Set<String> s = imports.isEmpty() ? entries.keySet() : set();
260      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
261         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getSections()));
262         s.addAll(entries.keySet());
263      }
264      return unmodifiable(s);
265   }
266
267   /**
268    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
269    *
270    * @param section
271    *    The section name.
272    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
273    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
274    * @return
275    *    An unmodifiable set of keys, or an empty set if the section doesn't exist.
276    */
277   public Set<String> getKeys(String section) {
278      checkSectionName(section);
279      ConfigSection cs = entries.get(section);
280      Set<String> s = imports.isEmpty() && cs != null ? cs.entries.keySet() : set();
281      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
282         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getKeys(section)));
283         if (cs != null)
284            s.addAll(cs.entries.keySet());
285      }
286      return unmodifiable(s);
287   }
288
289   /**
290    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
291    *
292    * @param section
293    *    The section name.
294    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
295    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
296    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
297    */
298   public boolean hasSection(String section) {
299      checkSectionName(section);
300      return entries.get(section) != null || imports.stream().anyMatch(x -> x.getConfigMap().hasSection(section));
301   }
302
303   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
304   // Setters
305   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
306
307   /**
308    * Adds a new section or replaces the pre-lines on an existing section.
309    *
310    * @param section
311    *    The section name.
312    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
313    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
314    * @param preLines
315    *    The pre-lines on the section.
316    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
317    * @return This object.
318    */
319   public ConfigMap setSection(String section, List<String> preLines) {
320      checkSectionName(section);
321      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setSection(name, section, preLines));
322   }
323
324   /**
325    * Adds or overwrites an existing entry.
326    *
327    * @param section
328    *    The section name.
329    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
330    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
331    * @param key
332    *    The entry key.
333    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
334    * @param value
335    *    The entry value.
336    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
337    * @param modifiers
338    *    Optional modifiers.
339    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
340    * @param comment
341    *    Optional comment.
342    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
343    * @param preLines
344    *    Optional pre-lines.
345    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
346    * @return This object.
347    */
348   public ConfigMap setEntry(String section, String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
349      checkSectionName(section);
350      checkKeyName(key);
351      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, section, key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines));
352   }
353
354
355   /**
356    * Not implemented.
357    *
358    * @param section
359    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
360    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
361    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
362    * @param importName
363    *    The import name.
364    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
365    * @param preLines
366    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the import statement.
367    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
368    * @return This object.
369    */
370   public ConfigMap setImport(String section, String importName, List<String> preLines) {
371      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
372   }
373
374   /**
375    * Removes a section.
376    *
377    * <p>
378    * This eliminates all entries in the section as well.
379    *
380    * @param section
381    *    The section name.
382    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
383    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
384    * @return This object.
385    */
386   public ConfigMap removeSection(String section) {
387      checkSectionName(section);
388      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeSection(name, section));
389   }
390
391   /**
392    * Removes an entry.
393    *
394    * @param section
395    *    The section name.
396    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
397    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
398    * @param key
399    *    The entry key.
400    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
401    * @return This object.
402    */
403   public ConfigMap removeEntry(String section, String key) {
404      checkSectionName(section);
405      checkKeyName(key);
406      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, section, key));
407   }
408
409   /**
410    * Not implemented.
411    *
412    * @param section
413    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
414    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
415    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
416    * @param importName
417    *    The import name.
418    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
419    * @return This object.
420    */
421   public ConfigMap removeImport(String section, String importName) {
422      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
423   }
424
425   private ConfigMap applyChange(boolean addToChangeList, ConfigEvent ce) {
426      if (ce == null)
427         return this;
428      try (SimpleLock x = lock.write()) {
429         String section = ce.getSection();
430         ConfigSection cs = entries.get(section);
431         if (ce.getType() == SET_ENTRY) {
432            if (cs == null) {
433               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
434               entries.put(section, cs);
435            }
436            ConfigMapEntry oe = cs.entries.get(ce.getKey());
437            if (oe == null)
438               oe = ConfigMapEntry.NULL;
439            cs.addEntry(
440               ce.getKey(),
441               ce.getValue() == null ? oe.value : ce.getValue(),
442               ce.getModifiers() == null ? oe.modifiers : ce.getModifiers(),
443               ce.getComment() == null ? oe.comment : ce.getComment(),
444               ce.getPreLines() == null ? oe.preLines : ce.getPreLines()
445            );
446         } else if (ce.getType() == SET_SECTION) {
447            if (cs == null) {
448               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
449               entries.put(section, cs);
450            }
451            if (ce.getPreLines() != null)
452               cs.setPreLines(ce.getPreLines());
453         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_ENTRY) {
454            if (cs != null)
455               cs.entries.remove(ce.getKey());
456         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_SECTION) {
457            if (cs != null)
458               entries.remove(section);
459         }
460         if (addToChangeList)
461            changes.add(ce);
462      }
463      return this;
464   }
465
466   /**
467    * Overwrites the contents of the config file.
468    *
469    * @param contents The new contents of the config file.
470    * @param synchronous Wait until the change has been persisted before returning this map.
471    * @return This object.
472    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
473    * @throws InterruptedException Thread was interrupted.
474    */
475   public ConfigMap load(String contents, boolean synchronous) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
476
477      if (synchronous) {
478         final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
479         ConfigStoreListener l = new ConfigStoreListener() {
480            @Override
481            public void onChange(String contents) {
482               latch.countDown();
483            }
484         };
485         store.register(name, l);
486         store.write(name, null, contents);
487         latch.await(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
488         store.unregister(name, l);
489      } else {
490         store.write(name, null, contents);
491      }
492      return this;
493   }
494
495   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
496   // Lifecycle events
497   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
498
499   /**
500    * Persist any changes made to this map and signal all listeners.
501    *
502    * <p>
503    * If the underlying contents of the file have changed, this will reload it and apply the changes
504    * on top of the modified file.
505    *
506    * <p>
507    * Subsequent changes made to the underlying file will also be signaled to all listeners.
508    *
509    * <p>
510    * We try saving the file up to 10 times.
511    * <br>If the file keeps changing on the file system, we throw an exception.
512    *
513    * @return This object.
514    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
515    */
516   public ConfigMap commit() throws IOException {
517      try (SimpleLock x = lock.write()) {
518         String newContents = asString();
519         for (int i = 0; i <= 10; i++) {
520            if (i == 10)
521               throw new ConfigException("Unable to store contents of config to store.");
522            String currentContents = store.write(name, contents, newContents);
523            if (currentContents == null)
524               break;
525            onChange(currentContents);
526         }
527         this.changes.clear();
528      }
529      return this;
530   }
531
532
533   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
534   // Listeners
535   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
536
537   /**
538    * Registers an event listener on this map.
539    *
540    * @param listener The new listener.
541    * @return This object.
542    */
543   public ConfigMap register(ConfigEventListener listener) {
544      listeners.add(listener);
545      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
546      return this;
547   }
548
549   boolean hasEntry(String section, String key) {
550      ConfigSection cs = entries.get(section);
551      ConfigMapEntry ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
552      return ce != null;
553   }
554
555   /**
556    * Unregisters an event listener from this map.
557    *
558    * @param listener The listener to remove.
559    * @return This object.
560    */
561   public ConfigMap unregister(ConfigEventListener listener) {
562      listeners.remove(listener);
563      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
564      return this;
565   }
566
567   /**
568    * Returns the listeners currently associated with this config map.
569    *
570    * @return The listeners currently associated with this config map.
571    */
572   public Set<ConfigEventListener> getListeners() {
573      return unmodifiable(listeners);
574   }
575
576   @Override /* ConfigStoreListener */
577   public void onChange(String newContents) {
578      ConfigEvents changes = null;
579      try (SimpleLock x = lock.write()) {
580         if (ne(contents, newContents)) {
581            changes = findDiffs(newContents);
582            load(newContents);
583
584            // Reapply our changes on top of the modifications.
585            this.changes.forEach(y -> applyChange(false, y));
586         }
587      } catch (IOException e) {
588         throw asRuntimeException(e);
589      }
590      if (changes != null && ! changes.isEmpty())
591         signal(changes);
592   }
593
594   @Override /* Object */
595   public String toString() {
596      try (SimpleLock x = lock.read()) {
597         return asString();
598      }
599   }
600
601   /**
602    * Returns the values in this config map as a map of maps.
603    *
604    * <p>
605    * This is considered a snapshot copy of the config map.
606    *
607    * <p>
608    * The returned map is modifiable, but modifications to the returned map are not reflected in the config map.
609    *
610    * @return A copy of this config as a map of maps.
611    */
612   public JsonMap asMap() {
613      JsonMap m = new JsonMap();
614      try (SimpleLock x = lock.read()) {
615         imports.forEach(y -> m.putAll(y.getConfigMap().asMap()));
616         entries.values().forEach(z -> {
617            Map<String,String> m2 = map();
618            z.entries.values().forEach(y -> m2.put(y.key, y.value));
619            m.put(z.name, m2);
620         });
621      }
622      return m;
623   }
624
625   /**
626    * Serializes this map to the specified writer.
627    *
628    * @param w The writer to serialize to.
629    * @return The same writer passed in.
630    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
631    */
632   public Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
633      try (SimpleLock x = lock.read()) {
634         for (ConfigSection cs : entries.values())
635            cs.writeTo(w);
636      }
637      return w;
638   }
639
640   /**
641    * Does a rollback of any changes on this map currently in memory.
642    *
643    * @return This object.
644    */
645   public ConfigMap rollback() {
646      if (changes.size() > 0) {
647         try (SimpleLock x = lock.write()) {
648            changes.clear();
649            load(contents);
650         } catch (IOException e) {
651            throw asRuntimeException(e);
652         }
653      }
654      return this;
655   }
656
657
658   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
659   // Private methods
660   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
661
662   private void checkSectionName(String s) {
663      if (! ("".equals(s) || isValidNewSectionName(s)))
664         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid section name: '"+s+"'");
665   }
666
667   private void checkKeyName(String s) {
668      if (! isValidKeyName(s))
669         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid key name: '"+s+"'");
670   }
671
672   private boolean isValidKeyName(String s) {
673      if (s == null)
674         return false;
675      s = s.trim();
676      if (s.isEmpty())
677         return false;
678      for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
679         char c = s.charAt(i);
680         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']' || c == '=' || c == '#')
681            return false;
682      }
683      return true;
684   }
685
686   private boolean isValidNewSectionName(String s) {
687      if (s == null)
688         return false;
689      s = s.trim();
690      if (s.isEmpty())
691         return false;
692      for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
693         char c = s.charAt(i);
694         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']')
695            return false;
696      }
697      return true;
698   }
699
700   private boolean isValidConfigName(String s) {
701      if (s == null)
702         return false;
703      s = s.trim();
704      if (s.isEmpty())
705         return false;
706      for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
707         char c = s.charAt(i);
708         if (i == 0) {
709            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierStart(c))
710               return false;
711         } else {
712            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierPart(c))
713               return false;
714         }
715      }
716      return true;
717   }
718
719   private void signal(ConfigEvents changes) {
720      if (changes.size() > 0)
721         listeners.forEach(x -> x.onConfigChange(changes));
722   }
723
724   private ConfigEvents findDiffs(String updatedContents) throws IOException {
725      ConfigEvents changes = new ConfigEvents();
726      ConfigMap newMap = new ConfigMap(store, name, updatedContents);
727
728      // Imports added.
729      for (Import i : newMap.imports) {
730         if (! imports.contains(i)) {
731            for (ConfigSection s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
732               for (ConfigMapEntry e : s.oentries.values()) {
733                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
734                     changes.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, e.key, e.value, e.modifiers, e.comment, e.preLines));
735                  }
736               }
737            }
738         }
739      }
740
741      // Imports removed.
742      for (Import i : imports) {
743         if (! newMap.imports.contains(i)) {
744            for (ConfigSection s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
745               for (ConfigMapEntry e : s.oentries.values()) {
746                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
747                     changes.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
748                  }
749               }
750            }
751         }
752      }
753
754      for (ConfigSection ns : newMap.oentries.values()) {
755         ConfigSection s = oentries.get(ns.name);
756         if (s == null) {
757            //changes.add(ConfigEvent.setSection(ns.name, ns.preLines));
758            for (ConfigMapEntry ne : ns.entries.values()) {
759               changes.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, ns.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
760            }
761         } else {
762            for (ConfigMapEntry ne : ns.oentries.values()) {
763               ConfigMapEntry e = s.oentries.get(ne.key);
764               if (e == null || ne(e.value, ne.value)) {
765                  changes.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
766               }
767            }
768            for (ConfigMapEntry e : s.oentries.values()) {
769               ConfigMapEntry ne = ns.oentries.get(e.key);
770               if (ne == null) {
771                  changes.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
772               }
773            }
774         }
775      }
776
777      for (ConfigSection s : oentries.values()) {
778         ConfigSection ns = newMap.oentries.get(s.name);
779         if (ns == null) {
780            //changes.add(ConfigEvent.removeSection(s.name));
781            for (ConfigMapEntry e : s.oentries.values())
782               changes.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
783         }
784      }
785
786      return changes;
787   }
788
789   // This method should only be called from behind a lock.
790   private String asString() {
791      try {
792         StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
793         for (ConfigSection cs : entries.values())
794            cs.writeTo(sw);
795         return sw.toString();
796      } catch (IOException e) {
797         throw asRuntimeException(e);  // Not possible.
798      }
799   }
800
801
802   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
803   // ConfigSection
804   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
805
806   class ConfigSection {
807
808      final String name;   // The config section name, or blank if the default section.  Never null.
809
810      final List<String> preLines = synced(list());
811      private final String rawLine;
812
813      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> oentries = synced(map());
814      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> entries = synced(map());
815
816      /**
817       * Constructor.
818       */
819      ConfigSection(String name) {
820         this.name = name;
821         this.rawLine = "[" + name + "]";
822      }
823
824      /**
825       * Constructor.
826       */
827      ConfigSection(List<String> lines) {
828
829         String name = null, rawLine = null;
830
831         int S1 = 1; // Looking for section.
832         int S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for end.
833         int state = S1;
834         int start = 0;
835
836         for (int i = 0; i < lines.size(); i++) {
837            String l = lines.get(i);
838            char c = StringUtils.firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
839            if (state == S1) {
840               if (c == '[') {
841                  int i1 = l.indexOf('['), i2 = l.indexOf(']');
842                  name = l.substring(i1+1, i2).trim();
843                  rawLine = l;
844                  state = S2;
845                  start = i+1;
846               } else {
847                  preLines.add(l);
848               }
849            } else {
850               if (c != '#' && l.indexOf('=') != -1) {
851                  ConfigMapEntry e = new ConfigMapEntry(l, lines.subList(start, i));
852                  if (entries.containsKey(e.key))
853                     throw new ConfigException("Duplicate entry found in section [{0}] of configuration:  {1}", name, e.key);
854                  entries.put(e.key, e);
855                  start = i+1;
856               }
857            }
858         }
859
860         this.name = name;
861         this.rawLine = rawLine;
862         this.oentries.putAll(entries);
863      }
864
865      ConfigSection addEntry(String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
866         ConfigMapEntry e = new ConfigMapEntry(key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines);
867         this.entries.put(e.key, e);
868         return this;
869      }
870
871      ConfigSection setPreLines(List<String> preLines) {
872         this.preLines.clear();
873         this.preLines.addAll(preLines);
874         return this;
875      }
876
877      Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
878         for (String s : preLines)
879            w.append(s).append('\n');
880
881         if (! name.equals(""))
882            w.append(rawLine).append('\n');
883         else {
884            // Need separation between default prelines and first-entry prelines.
885            if (! preLines.isEmpty())
886               w.append('\n');
887         }
888
889         for (ConfigMapEntry e : entries.values())
890            e.writeTo(w);
891
892         return w;
893      }
894   }
895
896
897   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
898   // Import
899   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
900
901   class Import {
902
903      private final ConfigMap configMap;
904      private final Map<ConfigEventListener,ConfigEventListener> listenerMap = synced(map());
905
906      Import(ConfigMap configMap) {
907         this.configMap = configMap;
908      }
909
910      synchronized Import register(Collection<ConfigEventListener> listeners) {
911         listeners.forEach(x -> register(x));
912         return this;
913      }
914
915      synchronized Import register(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
916         ConfigEventListener l2 = new ConfigEventListener() {
917            @Override
918            public void onConfigChange(ConfigEvents events) {
919               ConfigEvents events2 = new ConfigEvents();
920               events.stream().filter(x -> ! hasEntry(x.getSection(), x.getKey())).forEach(x -> events2.add(x));
921               if (events2.size() > 0)
922                  listener.onConfigChange(events2);
923            }
924         };
925         listenerMap.put(listener, l2);
926         configMap.register(l2);
927         return this;
928      }
929
930      synchronized Import unregister(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
931         configMap.unregister(listenerMap.remove(listener));
932         return this;
933      }
934
935      synchronized Import unregisterAll() {
936         listenerMap.values().forEach(x -> configMap.unregister(x));
937         listenerMap.clear();
938         return this;
939      }
940
941      String getConfigName() {
942         return configMap.name;
943      }
944
945      ConfigMap getConfigMap() {
946         return configMap;
947      }
948
949      @Override
950      public boolean equals(Object o) {
951         if (o instanceof Import) {
952            Import ir = (Import)o;
953            if (ir.getConfigName().equals(getConfigName()))
954               return true;
955         }
956         return false;
957      }
958
959      @Override
960      public int hashCode() {
961         return getConfigName().hashCode();
962      }
963   }
964}
